name: Dragon Craft
body:
### Welcome to Dragon Craft.
This mod for the popular indie game, Minecraft, adds Dragons to the game.

### Authors and Contributors
MrComputerGhost(@MrComputerGhost), merpelicous  (@merpelicous)
